name: Matthew G. Knepley
content: Matt Knepley's HomePage Matt Knepley's HomePage Home RELACS Center Computational Science Applications My Papers My Software My Grants and Awards Teaching CV Biography CAAM Google Citations arXiv ResearchGate Mendeley Profile ORCID SciENV NSF Bio Welcome to Chicago Arts & Letters Daily Matthew G. Knepley Computer Science and Engineering University at Buffalo 211A Capen Hall Box 602000 Buffalo, NY 14260-2500 Work: (716) 645-0747 Cell: (773) 41-EULER Unique Visitors View My Stats I have a new paper on Plex mesh transformations. Talks from PETSc 2025 at UB are now up. We have been awarded the Center for Hybrid Rocket Exascale Simulation Technology (CHREST) by the Department of Energy in the PSAAP III program. I have started a list of potential MS projects. Feel free to contact me about one. The RELACS Center homepage, describing work in scalable solvers, is now online. My Wife, Margarete Jadamec, at the University at Buffalo, who looks at dynamics of tectonic plate boundaries.
